Text:
Can this be burnt to a dvd and played on a regular dvd player? If it takes a special program to do it ---please tell me.

THANKS

Great pick for an upload

Not unless your DVD player can read MKV :)

(Which I highly doubt.)

External players are what I always suggest, other than your PC.
You can burn it to a DVD using ConvertXtoDVD (for example), but the quality will be downgraded to DVD's resolution.
Great BBR!  Any chance of getting the As-Filming-Continued docu with Laughton directing?  Or maybe a link to where I could find that torrent?
